name: js_deep_ppx

scripts.check: zsh -c './lib/bs/js/macros.native <(yarn -s bsrefmt --print binary --parse re < tests/Icons.re) >(yarn -s bsrefmt --parse binary)'
scripts.checkm: zsh -c './lib/bs/js/macros.native <(yarn -s bsrefmt --print binary --parse re < tests/Monads.re) >(yarn -s bsrefmt --parse binary)'

description: js_deep ppx for deep object manipulation and cloning in reason
author: Jared Forsyth
